snippet: Signs of a middle class with aspirations to more than the basics have encouraged major luxury brands.
abstract: Wide range of fashion designers are considering a larger investment in Africa as economies in several large countries there expand; formation of a middle class, especially in large cities, has fueled rising demand for luxury goods.
lead_paragraph: Signs of a middle class with aspirations to more than the basics have encouraged major luxury brands.

headline.seo: Fashion Houses Weigh a Deeper Investment in a Growing Africa
headline.main: Fashion Weighs a Deeper Investment in Africa
headline.print_headline: Fashion Weighs a Deeper Investment in Africa

keywords.value: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
keywords.name: organizations
